database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - 3D molecular analysis of skin surface_Time_Course_Volunteer 5-man-Face. MS/MS Data
entry.description: mzXML files of MS/MS data from skin swab samples of 1 man volunteer. Samples were collected from 17 spots on a man face, everyday during 10 days. MS/MS data collected from beauty products used by this subject are also included.
